name: thedailybeast
text: “We put on brave faces, and show up to do the jobs we committed to because, as we know, who better to tell the stories of Black lives than those of us who live them?" https://t.co/dkMci68S18

name: thedailybeast
text:
“Every few months of relative calm is followed by a new trending hashtag.”

name: thedailybeast
text: Despite the trauma of watching the evils of racism rise to the surface, we have a responsibility. And unlike others who may choose to stay away from the news to protect their mental health, “we can’t, because without journalists, the truth stays hidden.” https://t.co/dkMci68S18
